title: BRPD investigating fatal shooting on Spain St.
content:
BATON ROUGE, LA (WAFB) -
BRPD is investigating a fatal shooting on Spain Street that left a teen dead.
According to police, the shooting happened around 1:15 p.m. in the 2300 block of Spain St.
When police arrived, they found a 16-year-old male dead at the scene.
The shooting is remains under investigation.
If anyone has any information about this incident, you are asked to call the Violent Crimes Unit at 225-389-4869 or Crime Stoppers at 225-344-7867.
